TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MembershipUser extends System.Object

summary.span: 公開及更新成員資格資料存放區中的成員資格使用者資訊。

span.span: Exposes and updates membership user information in the membership data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件用來代表成員資格資料存放區中的單一成員資格使用者。The object is used to represent a single membership user in the membership data store. 它會公開成員資格使用者的電子郵件地址，例如的相關資訊，並提供成員資格使用者，例如能夠變更或重設其密碼的功能。It exposes information about the membership user such as the email address, and provides functionality for the membership user such as the ability to change or reset his or her password. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 的成員資格功能，請參閱[成員資格簡介](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980(v=vs.100))再繼續進行。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 如需成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用的成員資格管理使用者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). A物件由並方法或做為一部分所傳回， ，和方法。A object is returned by the and methods or as part of a returned by the , , and methods. A物件所方法，當您想要更新現有的成員資格使用者的資訊。A object is required by the method when you want to update the information for an existing membership user. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會更新使用者的電子郵件地址。The following code example updates the email address for a user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含一個文字方塊，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/CS/UpdateEmailcs.aspx#11)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/VB/UpdateEmailvb.aspx#11)]

summary.span: 以指定的屬性值，建立新的成員資格使用者物件。

span.span: Creates a new membership user object with the specified property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立新物件不會新增新的成員資格使用者物件的成員資格資料存放區。Creating a new object does not add a new membership user object to the membership data store. 若要新增新的成員資格使用者的成員資格資料存放區，請使用方法。To add a new membership user to the membership data store, use the method. 請注意，方法會傳回加入至資料存放區的成員資格使用者的物件。Note that the method returns a object for the membership user added to the data store. 可以搭配使用的應用程式程式碼中建構物件方法。 objects can be constructed in application code for use with the method. 或者，您也可以傳遞所傳回的物件， ， ， ，或方法，以以及方法。Alternatively, you can also pass a object returned from the , , , , or method to the method as well. 成員資格提供者的實作方式通常也建構物件， ， ， ，和方法。 objects are also commonly constructed by membership-provider implementations for the , , , , and methods. `name`， `email`，和`passwordQuestion`參數會修剪之前使用。The `name`, `email`, and `passwordQuestion` parameters are all trimmed before being used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範實作成員資格提供者的方法。The following code example shows an implementation of the method for a membership provider. 方法會建構使用者已成功新增至資料存放區時，會傳回的物件。The method constructs a object that is returned when the user is successfully added to the data store. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Constructor/CS/newuser.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.Constructor/VB/newuser.vb#1)]

span.span: if the update was successful; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法所參考的成員資格提供者屬性，以更新成員資格資料存放區中的成員資格使用者的密碼。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to update the password for the membership user in the membership data store. 成員資格提供者可能有限制大小的密碼。The membership provider may have restrictions on the size of the password. 如需大小限制，請參閱成員資格提供者的文件。For size limitations, see the documentation for the membership provider. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會修改目前的登入使用者的密碼。The following code example modifies the password for the current logged-on user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含一個文字方塊，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以用來儲存成員資格使用者特有應用程式的自訂資訊。The property can be used to store custom information for a membership user that is specific to an application. 可儲存的資訊量屬性所參考的成員資格提供者所定義屬性。The amount of information that can be stored in the property for a is defined by the membership provider referenced by the property. 如果您的應用程式需要更多空間來儲存使用者資訊超過所允許的成員資格提供者，您可以實作自訂的成員資格提供者，或使用使用者。If your application requires more space to store user information than is allowed by the membership provider, you can implement a custom membership provider, or use the user .

Introduction to ASP.NET Membership

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetPassword() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetPassword () As String
public: virtual System::String ^ GetPassword();
abstract member GetPassword : unit -> string override this.GetPassword : unit -> string

summary.span: 從成員資格資料存放區取得成員資格使用者的密碼。

span.span: Gets the password for the membership user from the membership data store.

returns.span: 成員資格使用者的密碼。

span.span: The password for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法所參考的成員資格提供者屬性，以從成員資格資料存放區擷取的成員資格的密碼。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to retrieve the password for the membership from the membership data store. 如果是`false`，成員資格提供者會傳回例外狀況。If is `false`, the membership provider will return an exception. 如果提供者支援密碼的，您將無法擷取成員資格使用者的密碼，而且應該考慮進行使用方法，當使用者忘記其密碼。If the provider supports passwords with a of , you will be unable to retrieve the password for the membership user and should consider making use of the method when a user has forgotten his or her password. > [!NOTE] > A便會擲回`enablePasswordRetrieval`設為`true`並`passwordFormat`設定為`Hashed`ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中。A will be thrown if `enablePasswordRetrieval` is set to `true` and `passwordFormat` is set to `Hashed` in the Web.config file for the ASP.NET application. 如果已`true`，您必須使用多載，密碼會回答做為參數，並提供成員資格使用者的密碼解答。If is `true`, you must use the overload that takes a password answer as a parameter and supply the password answer for the membership user. 如果有密碼解答是必要的提供不正確的密碼解答，成員資格提供者所擲回。If a password answer is required and an incorrect password answer is supplied, a is thrown by the membership provider. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫方法來擷取指定的使用者名稱的密碼。The following code example calls the method to retrieve the password for a specified user name. 密碼會傳送至使用者的電子郵件地址。The password is sent to the user's email address. 請注意，假設為`false`。Note that is assumed to be `false`. > [!NOTE] > 適用於需要高的安全性層級的網站，不建議使用電子郵件以純文字傳回密碼。Returning a password in clear text using email is not recommended for sites that require a high level of security. 對於高安全性的網站，建議您傳回使用加密，例如 SSL 密碼。For high-security sites, it is recommended that you return passwords using encryption, such as SSL. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含一個文字方塊，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/CS/retrievepassword2cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/VB/retrievepassword2vb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法所參考的成員資格提供者屬性來擷取成員資格資料存放區中的成員資格使用者的密碼。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to retrieve the password for the membership user from the membership data store. 如果有密碼解答是必要的提供不正確的密碼解答，成員資格提供者所擲回。If a password answer is required and an incorrect password answer is supplied, a is thrown by the membership provider. 如果是`false`，成員資格提供者會傳回例外狀況。If is `false`, the membership provider will return an exception. 如果提供者支援密碼的，您將無法擷取成員資格使用者的密碼，而且應該考慮進行使用方法，當使用者忘記其密碼。If the provider supports passwords with a of , you will be unable to retrieve the password for the membership user and should consider making use of the method when a user has forgotten his or her password. > [!NOTE] > A便會擲回`enablePasswordRetrieval`設為`true`並`passwordFormat`設定為`Hashed`ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中。A will be thrown if `enablePasswordRetrieval` is set to `true` and `passwordFormat` is set to `Hashed` in the Web.config file for the ASP.NET application. 如果已`false`，您可以提供`null`如`answer`參數，或者使用未採用任何參數的多載。If is `false`, you can supply `null` for the `answer` parameter, or use the overload that does not take any parameters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫方法來擷取指定的使用者名稱的密碼，如果在提供正確的密碼解答。The following code example calls the method to retrieve the password for a specified user name if the correct password answer is supplied. 密碼會傳送至使用者的電子郵件地址。The password is sent to the user's email address. > [!NOTE] > 適用於需要高的安全性層級的網站，不建議使用電子郵件以純文字傳回密碼。Returning a password in clear text using email is not recommended for sites that require a high level of security. 對於高安全性的網站，建議您傳回使用加密，例如 SSL 密碼。For high-security sites, it is recommended that you return passwords using encryption, such as SSL. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含一個文字方塊，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者最常遭到鎖定且無法驗證所方法時內到達。Users are most commonly locked out and cannot be validated by the method when the is reached within the . 使用者如果您使用也會鎖定或是多載，接受密碼解答和使用者輸入不正確的解答數目達到內。Users can also be locked out if you use the or overload that accepts a password answer and the number of bad answers entered by the user reaches the within the . 若要將此屬性設定為`false`，讓使用者嘗試登入一次，您可以使用方法。To set this property to `false` and let the user try to log in again, you can use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用者線上視為目前的日期和時間減去屬性值是早於使用者。A user is considered online if the current date and time minus the property value is earlier than the for the user. 針對使用者會更新為目前的日期和時間，並方法，而且可以更新所提供部分的多載方法。The for a user is updated to the current date and time by the , and methods, and can be updated by some of the overloads of the method. > [!NOTE] > 中的類別更新使用者的屬性值而每當使用者資料是從擷取或設定在資料來源的命名空間。The property value for a user is updated by the classes in the and the namespaces whenever user data is retrieved from or set at the data source. 如果您的應用程式來儲存使用者資訊，請使用相同的資料來源和您並設有相同`applicationName`做為您，則和之使用者的屬性將反映此行為。If your application uses the same data source to store user information, and your and are configured with the same `applicationName` as your , then the and properties of the user will reflect this behavior. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的所有成員資格使用者名稱控制項，並使用標籤以顯示選取的使用者名稱 中，特定的成員資格資訊包括成員資格使用者的屬性值。The following code example displays all membership user names in a control and uses labels to show specific membership information for the selected user name, including the property value for the membership user. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection/CS/itemcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection/VB/itemvb.aspx#2)]

span.span: The date and time when the membership user was last authenticated or accessed the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對使用者會更新為目前的日期和時間並方法，而且可以更新一些多載方法。The for a user is updated to the current date and time by the and methods, and can be updated by some overloads of the method. 您可以使用方法來設定特定日期和時間的屬性。You can use the method to set the property to a specific date and time. 用來判斷使用者是否在線上。The is used to determine whether a user is online. 如果使用者線上視為目前的日期和時間減去屬性值是早於使用者。A user is considered online if the current date and time minus the property value is earlier than the for the user. 設定， ， ，並日期設定為相同的日期和時間所建立成員資格使用者時方法。The sets the , , , and date to the same date and time when a membership user is created by the method. > [!NOTE] > 使用者已更新的類別而每當使用者資料是從擷取或設定在資料來源的命名空間。The for a user is updated by the classes in the and the namespaces whenever user data is retrieved from or set at the data source. 如果您的應用程式來儲存使用者資訊，請使用相同的資料來源和您並設有相同`applicationName`做為您，則和之使用者的屬性將反映此行為。If your application uses the same data source to store user information, and your and are configured with the same `applicationName` as your , then the and properties of the user will reflect this behavior. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的所有成員資格使用者名稱控制項，並使用標籤以顯示選取的使用者名稱 中，特定的成員資格資訊包括成員資格使用者的屬性值。The following code example displays all membership user names in a control and uses labels to show specific membership information for the selected user name, including the property value for the membership user. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者最常鎖定的時機內到達。Users are most commonly locked out when the is reached within the . 使用者如果您使用也會鎖定或是多載，接受密碼解答和使用者輸入不正確的解答數目達到內。Users can also be locked out if you use the or overload that accepts a password answer and the number of bad answers entered by the user reaches the within the . 預設值為屬性取決於成員資格提供者。The default value for the property is determined by the membership provider. 例如，成員資格使用者建立時使用提供者，使用者一開始設定為 01/01/1754年。For example, when a membership user is created using the provider, the property for the user is initially set to 01/01/1754.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已`true`，則必須提供成員資格使用者的密碼解答和方法。If is `true`, then the password answer for a membership user must be supplied to the and methods. 做為成員資格使用者，他或她的密碼解答時所發生的提醒。The serves as a reminder to the membership user of what his or her password answer is. 回應值之後的成員資格使用者已經提供密碼解答，可以提供給或方法。Once the membership user has supplied a password answer, the answer value can be supplied to the or method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會重設使用者的密碼，如果他或她會提供適當的密碼解答。The following code example resets a user's password if he or she supplies the appropriate password answer. 使用者會顯示使用者的密碼解答的提醒。The for the user is displayed as a reminder to the user of the password answer. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含一個文字方塊，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/CS/ResetPasswordcs.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/VB/ResetPasswordvb.aspx#5)]

summary.span: 取得成員資格提供者的名稱，該提供者儲存和擷取成員資格使用者的使用者資訊。

value.span: 成員資格提供者的名稱，該提供者儲存和擷取成員資格使用者的使用者資訊。

span.span: The name of the membership provider that stores and retrieves user information for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會公開管理資訊的成員資格提供者名稱。The property exposes the name of the membership provider that manages the information for the . 您可以使用來存取成員資格使用者的特定成員資格提供者執行個體屬性類別，或是否有提供者是應用程式的預設提供者。You can access the specific membership provider instance for a membership user by using the property of the class, whether or not the provider is the default provider for the application. 例如，您可以建立採用的方法物件做為輸入並更新根據您的商務邏輯。For example, you may create a method that takes a object as input and updates the based on your business logic. 您可以確保適當的成員資格提供者用來更新藉由呼叫方法的成員資格提供者，從編製索引的集合屬性值。You can ensure that the appropriate membership provider is used to update the by calling the method of the membership provider from the collection that is indexed by the property value.

summary.span: 將使用者的密碼重設為自動產生的新密碼。

span.span: Resets a user's password to a new, automatically generated password.

returns.span: 成員資格使用者的新密碼。

span.span: The new password for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法所參考的成員資格提供者重設為新的成員資格使用者的密碼自動產生密碼的屬性。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to reset the password for the membership user to a new, automatically generated password. 新的密碼，然後會傳回給呼叫者。The new password is then returned to the caller. 如果是`false`，成員資格提供者會傳回例外狀況。If is `false`, the membership provider will return an exception. 如果已`true`，您必須使用多載，密碼會回答做為參數，並提供成員資格使用者的密碼解答。If is `true`, you must use the overload that takes a password answer as a parameter and supply the password answer for the membership user. 如果有密碼解答是必要的提供不正確的密碼解答，成員資格提供者所擲回。If a password answer is required and an incorrect password answer is supplied, a is thrown by the membership provider. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會重設使用者的密碼，並傳回新的、 自動產生密碼。The following code example resets a user's password and returns the new, automatically generated password. 請注意，假設為`false`。Note that is assumed to be `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含一個文字方塊，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/CS/ResetPassword2cs.aspx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/VB/ResetPassword2vb.aspx#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法所參考的成員資格提供者重設為新的成員資格使用者的密碼自動產生密碼的屬性。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to reset the password for the membership user to a new, automatically generated password. 新的密碼，然後會傳回給呼叫者。The new password is then returned to the caller. 如果是`false`，成員資格提供者會傳回例外狀況。If is `false`, the membership provider will return an exception. 如果已`false`，您可以提供`null`如`answer`參數，或者使用未採用任何參數的多載。If is `false`, you can supply `null` for the `answer` parameter, or use the overload that does not take any parameters. 如果有密碼解答是必要的提供不正確的密碼解答，成員資格提供者所擲回。If a password answer is required and an incorrect password answer is supplied, a is thrown by the membership provider. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會重設使用者的密碼，並傳回新的、 自動產生密碼。The following code example resets a user's password and returns the new, automatically generated password. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含一個文字方塊，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 清除使用者的鎖定狀態，以便驗證成員資格使用者。

span.span: Clears the locked-out state of the user so that the membership user can be validated.

returns.span: 如果成功解除鎖定成員資格使用者，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the membership user was successfully unlocked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者最常遭到鎖定且無法驗證所方法時內到達。Users are most commonly locked out and cannot be validated by the method when the is reached within the . 使用者如果您使用也會鎖定或是多載，接受密碼解答和使用者輸入不正確的解答數目達到的值內。Users can also be locked out if you use the or overload that accepts a password answer and the number of bad answers entered by the user reaches the value of within the . 此方法的實作應該設定屬性，以`false`，將屬性設為目前的日期，並重設任何您用來追蹤數的計數器無法登入嘗試，依此類推。Your implementation of this method should set the property to `false`, set the property to the current date, and reset any counters that you use to track the number of failed log in attempts and so forth.

summary.span: 取得成員資格使用者的登入名稱。

span.span: Gets the logon name of the membership user.

value.span: 成員資格使用者的登入名稱。

span.span: The logon name of the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成員資格使用者的成員資格使用者的密碼搭配用來驗證成員資格使用者。A membership user's is used in conjunction with the membership user's password to authenticate the membership user. 的識別唯一的使用者，每個應用程式使用進行驗證。The of a identifies a unique user for each application that uses for authentication. 應用程式由成員資格。An application is identified by the membership . 相同的使用者名稱可以用於多個應用程式，針對不同的使用者。The same user name can be used in multiple applications for different users. 或者，單一使用者名稱可用來識別使用者的多個應用程式，提供應用程式設定的相同。Alternatively, a single user name can be used to identify a user for multiple applications, provided the applications are configured with the same . 您可以擷取透過將使用者名稱傳遞至其中一個多載的成員資格使用者的物件方法，或成員的身分傳回， ，或方法。You can retrieve a object for a membership user by passing the user name to one of the overloads of the method, or as a member of a returned from the , , or method. 您可以擷取成員資格使用者的使用者名稱，如果已知使用者的電子郵件地址，使用方法。You can retrieve the user name for a membership user if the email address for the user is known, by using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例繫結應用程式中的所有成員資格使用者的屬性控制項，並使用標籤以顯示選取的使用者名稱的特定成員資格資訊。The following code example binds the property of all the membership users in an application to a control and uses labels to show specific membership information for a selected user name. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection/CS/itemcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection/VB/itemvb.aspx#2)]
